data.title: About Seva Group Foundation
data.meta_description: Seva group Foundation is the best NGO in Ghaziabad location. To help poor child, old people & widows Seva group foundation comes top 5 NGO in Noida
data.text:
What we Do

In a world with more than enough food to feed everyone, it's unacceptable that 840 million people go hungry each year. Moreover, several people are going through social injustice and poverty. Understanding the need for change in society, the Seva Group Foundation works to end poverty and social injustice by providing food, water, and other necessities to vulnerable children and orphans worldwide. We have helped thousands of needy children and impacted over 300 orphanages.

The Seva Group Foundation, headquartered in Noida and New Delhi, is an NGO that was founded to help those in needs. The idea behind the NGO is to provide help and support to those unable to help themselves. Our Foundation provides help and support to various people and organizations, including the elderly, the disabled, and the poor. The Seva Group Foundation is the best NGO in greater noida, Delhi Ncr also provides support to other NGOs that are working to help the needy. The Seva Group Foundation is one of the many NGOs working to make a difference in the world.
